sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { useMediaQuery } from 'react-responsive'; import OwlCarousel from 'react-owl-carousel'; import 'owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.carousel.css'; import 'owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.theme.default.css'; export const Owl = ({ mentorListObj }) => { return (
{mentorListObj.map((mentorObj, index) => { return (
{mentorObj.name}

{mentorObj.tagLine}

Book a session with me!
) })}
) }
